title: Reflecting on morning anxiety
content: This morning I felt overwhelmed by my to-do list...
insights: I realized I was catastrophizing about the deadline
situation: Looking at my calendar and seeing 5 meetings
thoughts: I'll never get everything done. I'm going to fail.
behaviors: Avoided starting work, scrolled social media
alternative_thoughts: I can prioritize. I've handled busy weeks before. I can ask for help if needed.
